mapper.select: select * from meetroom where roomnum=103 and TO_CHAR(setdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(#{setdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by starttime
select * from meetroom where roomnum=222 and TO_CHAR(setdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(#{setdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by starttime
select * from meetroom where roomnum=503 and TO_CHAR(setdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(#{setdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by starttime
select * from meetroom where roomnum=710 and TO_CHAR(setdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(#{setdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by starttime
select * from meetroom where roomnum=901 and TO_CHAR(setdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(#{setdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by starttime
select * from meetroom where roomnum=907 and TO_CHAR(setdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(#{setdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by starttime
